stonehoe.name: Stone hoe
stonehoe.description: Slightly better than the wooden hoe, but still has room for improvement. Farming range is changed from *-50, 50* to *-50, 75*

ironhoe.name: Iron hoe
ironhoe.description: A fast, reliable farming tool. You feel energised when wielding it. Farming range is changed from *-50, 50* to *-25, 75*

diamondhoe.name: Diamond hoe
diamondhoe.description: The shimmering blue blade increases your potato farming abilities. Farming range is changed from *-50, 50* to *-25, 100*

lotterypotato.name: Lottery Potato
lotterypotato.description: When used, offers a 5% chance of earning 42069 :potato:. Can also be collected through digging.

potatotrophy.name: Potato Trophy
potatotrophy.description: Flex your 5mil potatoes with this trophy. Only the rich can afford this.

goldenpotato.name: Golden Potato
goldenpotato.description: The holy golden potato. Can also be collected through digging.

invisiblepotato.name: Invisible Potato
invisiblepotato.description: Basically Lay's chips. Can also be collected through digging.

potatochip.name: Potato Chip
potatochip.description: A single potato chip. Can also be collected through digging.

rottenpotato.name: Rotten Potato
rottenpotato.description: Why would you buy this. Can also be collected through digging.
